com.mlt.desktop.graphic

Class Composition

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mlt.desktop.graphic.Composition

  • public class Composition
extends java.lang.Object
    A composition concatenates a list of drawings with fill or draw operations.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
